Study Title: Phase II/III Trial of CPT-11/5-FU/l-LV Versus CPT-11/TS-1 as Second Line Chemotherapy of Unresectable Colorectal Cancer
Brief Summary: This study is designed as Phase II/III. Phase II is aimed to evaluate safety and efficacy of IRIS, and feasibility of FOLFIRI. Phase III is aimed to verify inferiority of the progression free survival of IRIS in comparison with FOLFIRI.
Interventions: DRUG: CPT-11 and TS-1|DRUG: CPT-11, 5-FU and l-LV
Primary Outcome Measures: Progression free survival, every course for first three courses, then every other course
Secondary Outcome Measures: Over all survival, Response rate, Adverse event, Medical economy, adverse events will be collected during treatment
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
Locations: Saku Central Hospital, Saku City, Nagano, 384-0301, Japan
